extendedInfo.description: Live TV news, videos, latest news, photos from India & more. On your Android.Convert your Android phone or tab into a complete news device. Get the latest headlines and complete news reports from India wherever you want it. - Watch live TV on three channels: CNN-IBN - English; IBN7 - Hindi; IBN Lokmat - Marathi- Read and comment on all the latest news  - View news clips on video - Watch all the acclaimed shows from CNN-IBN- View photogalleries - Get live cricket scores- Read blogs- Save stories to read late- Share on Facebook and Twitter

reviews.title: Very refeshing and rich.. thumbs up..
reviews.comment: A refreshing interface and nice way to deliver content. However there is room for customization and localization like I cannot select the state or topic by myself . Plz include it..
reviews.author: avinash shyam

reviews.title: Awesome but still needs some features
reviews.comment: This is kind of an ideal app for indian news I was waiting for. I would say this is even better than CNN or even BBC tablet apps in terms of responsiveness and organization.  Still needs some features like black backround screen or night mode, ability add or remove sections on the screen.  But hey,  good job guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app needs improvement
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app with up-to-date content and rich media. But sections must be easier to sort & access and options to share articles to other apps needs to be improved.
reviews.author: Janak Bathija

reviews.title: Refreshing Ui
reviews.comment: Great update after a long time...Tablet Ui is refreshing....;) well done Ibnlive....:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best Indian newsapp
reviews.comment: Very beautifully designed and colourful. Reasonable quality of news. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: natakala saimurali

reviews.title: Need changes
reviews.comment: When we click on any article, more than half page is covered by photo n a very little space for article content, need to keep on scrolling for every 3 lines is so irritating.
reviews.author: Pr Gv

reviews.title: Only India news
reviews.comment: Will move to 2 to 5 if - international headlines,  business news sensex,dollar,gold trend.only Bare minimum news in each categories will be added. Not my way..to uninstall though layout is excellent.
reviews.author: Subrat Prajapati

reviews.title: Great app!!!! Must have for Indians
reviews.comment: Works good and also has live tv. Used it with WiFi. Fine tv resolution ok ok (not hd). But any timebetter than other eng news app like BBC news
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zoom & Black Screen option required
reviews.comment: IBN\'s partner CNN\'s app can be taken as benchmark for this... Changing letter size option, white letters over black background( as in previous version) options should be there...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but can be bettered!
reviews.comment: It\'s a great news read but give me the customization capacity on the number of articles that I can have under each topic. I feel 3 is very less... I\'d want at least 5 articles under each tab!
reviews.author: Sree Ram

reviews.title: Video content inaccessible
reviews.comment: App works fine as long as it\'s used to read articles etc. but neither live TV nor video contents loads, no matter how good connection is. Strangely, videos on other network 18 app firstpost. com work as they should.
reviews.author: Diljinder Nagra

reviews.title: Add Widgets and Popups
reviews.comment: Looks like a web page.  Please add widgets for desktop. Some sort of pop ups for some flash news updates.
reviews.author: Mayur Chheda

reviews.title: Good tablet optimized updated
reviews.comment: The new update looks and feels much better than the original one especially on tablets. Please add offline support for five stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please improve
reviews.comment: Please please fix the live TV error first not able to view the TV on my nexus 7&4
reviews.author: pushkar dixit

reviews.title: Good app need some improvements
reviews.comment: I would love to see the landscape mode for the live tv streaming
reviews.author: Ravi Sankar

reviews.title: Great text details,but Live streaming not working
reviews.comment: In total great app with great look and functionality, but the video potion for the live streaming not working, team please correct this one, then I will give it a five start rating.
reviews.author: Nitesh Thakur

reviews.title: It\'s official now
reviews.comment: It\'s official now IBN application is better than NDTV. Well done IBN. We need some full screen pics at tablet version. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Manas Chakrabarti

reviews.title: Buggy.
reviews.comment: The interface is good but the application is buggy. Whenever I tap on a section of news, say golf or tech, the app always says that there is no network, which is not true. Fix this issue asap.
reviews.author: Om Prakash

reviews.title: App not upto the mark after upgrade!
reviews.comment: Ever since the app update it takes too long to open and importantly Live TV doesnt work. Always returns an error. Fix this app else will delete it soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A useful app by a good news channel
reviews.comment: The feed is good. Doesn\'t lag. I would\'ve rated 5 stars, if it had an autorotate option as the video gets stretched in full screen. Hope to see it in the next upgrade.
reviews.author: nivesh gupta
